title: Senior AI Engineer
description: We are seeking a Senior AI Engineer to join our team in Islamabad. You will work on Large Language Models, Generative AI, and computer vision projects for global clients. Tech stack includes Python, PyTorch, and Azure AI.
requirements: 3+ years of experience in AI/ML. Proficiency in Python and Deep Learning frameworks. Experience with Azure or AWS. Strong problem-solving skills.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Afiniti is looking for a Full Stack Developer in Islamabad. You will build and maintain high-performance web applications using React and Node.js.
requirements: 2+ years of experience in React and Node. Mentor junior developers. Strong understanding of microservices.

title: Remote Python Backend Engineer
description: Join GitLab's fully remote team to work on the world's leading DevSecOps platform. You will be responsible for scaling backend services using Python and Go.
requirements: 4+ years of backend development. Experience with high-traffic systems. Passion for open source and remote work.

title: Machine Learning Engineer (Remote)
description: Zapier is hiring ML engineers to build intelligent automation features. Work from anywhere in the world and help us shape the future of automation.
requirements: Strong background in ML and software engineering. Experience with Python, Scikit-learn, and cloud environments.

title: Data Scientist
description: Teradata Islamabad is looking for a Data Scientist to help customers derive value from their data. You will build predictive models and perform advanced analytics.
requirements: MS in Data Science or related field. 2+ years of experience. Proficiency in SQL and Python.

title: Software Engineer (Remote)
description: Automattic is the company behind WordPress.com. We are looking for engineers who want to make the web a better place. Work from anywhere!
requirements: Experience with PHP, JavaScript, and React. Strong focus on user experience and scale.
